professionalSummary.title: Professional Summary
professionalSummary.content:
Professional with a strong technical foundation in back-end and solution architecture, focusing on cloud environments (Azure and AWS), microservices, and distributed systems. Senior Consultant at Avanade, working on technical design, team leadership, and delivery of robust solutions.

T-Shaped profile: technical depth (C#, Node.js, Java/Spring Boot), ease in transitioning between product, operation, and strategy. Motivated by well-structured systems, solid decisions, and consistent team evolution.

description: Technical team leadership (7 devs), code review, delivery practices.
Scalable and resilient REST APIs (Node.js, Hexagonal Architecture, Java/Spring Batch).
AWS Serverless Stack: Lambda, DynamoDB, RDS Postgres, EventBridge, SQS, API Gateway, S3.
Previous projects: Azure, C# .NET Core, Angular/TypeScript, Azure Service Bus, TDD, DDD.
Development in C#, ASP.NET MVC, Flutter, SQLite.

certifications.title: Certifications
list: Microsoft Certified MTA: Software Development Fundamentals

education.title: Education
degrees: MBA in Information Management - Salvador University (2009-2010)
Bachelor's Degree in Information Systems - Salvador University (2002-2007)
